cause.description:
Chaldean Catholics are being persecuted in Iraq for their faith. These people have been overlooked. Many do not know that they are being killed for their faith. We must help them.
<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/k6WpTLEUJYg"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/k6WpTLEUJYg" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>
1. Stop Assyrian Christian Genocide!
2. Save the Chaldeans!
3. Don't forget your christian brother and sisters is Iraq!
cause.mission: End the genocide and martyrdom of Chaldean Christians living in Iraq
cause.name: Save The Assyrian Chaldean Christians
